metadata.name: Leave Me Be
metadata.description:
While you had your wounds mended and gilded with gold over many years through contemplation and healing...  
When you were finally able to recover and live a normal life among the masses...  
When you had finally forgotten everything from the past...  
I showed up​​​​​​​...

"Leave Me Be" is a generative art on the topic of 'pain' and 'trauma' which uses machine learning to detect faces through the device's camera and change the state of the art based on whether a face is present or not.

View art in fullscreen:  
https://arweave.net/cpN-H-S8ZvxfEQKk3fCPOoVUxxi5hYzaqnC4dX7qkY0

Read more: https://nurecas.com/leave-me-be
